author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: List Containers under the specified storage account.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-list

commands.description: List Blobs under the specified container.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-list

commands.description: Create a new Container under the specified account.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-create

commands.description: Retrieve the tags of the specified Blob.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-tag-get

commands.description: Create a new Blob under the specified Container.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-create

commands.description: Marks the specified Blob for deletion. The Blob will be deleted during garbage collection.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-delete

commands.description: Update the content of an existing Blob.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-update

commands.description: Sets the tags for the specified Blob. The command replace the entire tags of the Blob and can be used to remove tags.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-blob-tag-set

commands.description: Marks the specified Container for deletion. The Container and any Blobs contained within it, will be deleted during garbage collection.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-delete

commands.description: Retrieve properties for the specified Container.
commands.name: azure-storage-container-property-get

integration.description: Create and Manage Azure Storage Container services.
integration.name: Azure Storage Container

description: Create and Manage Azure Storage Container services.
name: Azure Storage Container
readme:
# Azure Storage Container Pack The Azure Storage platform is Microsoft's cloud storage solution for modern data storage scenarios. Core storage services offer a massively scalable object store for data objects, disk storage for Azure virtual machines (VMs), a file system service for the cloud, a messaging store for reliable messaging, and a NoSQL store.
This pack contains an integration, with a main goal to manage Azure Storage Container and Blobs services.
Integration capabilities: - Create, delete and retrieve containers information. - Create, delete, update and retrieve blobs information. - Manage blob tags. ### Pack Contributors: --- - Enes Ozdemir Contributions are welcome and appreciated. For more info, visit our [Contribution Guide](https://xsoar.pan.dev/docs/contributing/contributing).
